name: Spect
introduce: Spect has  built a tool for DAOs to manage grants, onboarding and projects all on Spect and make decisions about grant applications & who to onboard in a decentralized way. Spect also comes with a customizable project management tool to track tasks, grants, onboarding and bounties. One can distribute ERC-20 tokens, Soulbound tokens and arrange information in many different ways.
